DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety effectiveness compute tomography angiography diagnostic therapeutic cycle first-choice method image diagnosis patient high probability stable coronary artery disease accord European Society Cardiology recommendation .
DOC.brief_title: Computed Tomography First-Choice Diagnostics High Pre-Test Probability Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomized open-label , single center trial evaluate superiority angio-CT classic coronary angiography ( concern effectiveness safety ) diagnosis stable coronary artery disease patient indication invasive coronary angiography .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 year 2 . Patients provide write informed consent 3 . Indications elective invasive coronary angiography define European Society Cardiology : Left ventricle ejection fraction < 50 % typical angina symptom , Probability coronary artery disease due criterion age , sex symptom > 85 % , Probability coronary artery disease due criterion age , sex symptom 5085 % positive moderate cardiac stress test . 1 . No Consent study 2 . Acute coronary syndrome 3 . Recurrence typical angina symptom 1 year last percutaneous coronary revascularization , 4 . Contraindications invasive coronary angiography 5 . GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 6 . Significant arrhythmia 7 . BMI > 35 kg/m2
